post.author: 이홍식
post.content:
POSTED AT 4:18 PM EDT Thursday, October 3 Creative or desperate? A bit of both By MATHEW INGRAM Globe and Mail Update
Yes. The proliferation of sub-brands at Canada's largest airline may be about the only option Mr. Milton has at this point,
캐나다 최대 항공업체 (AirCanada)가 자회사 증식(From Tango to Zip and Jetz to Jazz) 에 열을 올리고 있는데요. 필자가 보기엔 업체의 노력이 창의적이기 보단 절망에서 기인한 몸부림이 아닐까 생각된다구요...
야후사전... pro·lif·er·a·tion － n. [Ｕ] 증식; 만연, 확산(↔ nonproliferation). ㆍ the ∼ of nuclear weapons 핵무기 확산.
cambridge dictionary... proliferate verb [I] to increase greatly and suddenly in number Small businesses have proliferated in the last ten years.
proliferation noun [U] Over the past two years we have witnessed the proliferation of TV channels.
post.title: proliferation
